subject: From: VUSI NDLOVU ATTORNEYS
body:
From: VUSI NDLOVU ATTORNEYS & ASSOCIATES.
25 Toscana,Lonehill .Johannesburg.
Email i.d: 
doversterattorneys@lawyer.com
vsndlovuchambers2010@gmail.com
31/05/2022
Attn:  
We are in receipt of your mail.
 
 
We are very glad to inform you that your winning details has been verified and confirmed by me (Barr. J. V. Ndlovu) at the lottery office today.
 
I will be submitting a letter of claim on your behalf at the lottery office upon our receipt of any of your scanned copy of your Identifications.
 
It is important that you proved us with any of of ID details  to enable us commence our legal services on your behalf.
 
Do call me (Barr. J. V. Ndlovu) for any clarification urgently.
 
Thanks
Barr.Mrs. Doris Ndlovu.

subject: Re:    From: VUSI NDLOVU ATTORNEYS
body:
Hello Doris Ndlovu,

Thank you for your email and the exciting news! I'm thrilled to hear about this. Could you please provide me with more details about the lottery? When was it held and how was my name selected?

I understand that you need some form of ID for verification, but I'm a bit hesitant to share such sensitive information over email. Is there any other way we can verify my identity without sharing personal documents?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Blair
